pullrequest.title: Property panel for desktop and mobile (non-editable)

content.raw:
I think we should try to separate the scene logic from the gui logic to keep the design more modular. So this means the scene should not have to manage gui tabs.

for the case where `openTab` is `true`, which looks like its only in gzgui.js `guiEvents.on('selectEntity', function (name){...})`, can we handle the openTab logic there?
